name: Memory imaging
description: Involves creating a copy of the live memory data of a running system
examples: FTK Imager - Can capture both RAM and the pagefile of the system
references: Case, A. and Richard III, G. G., 2017. Memory forensics: The path forward. Digital investigation, 20, 23-33.
Latzo, T., Palutke, R. and Freiling, F., 2019. A universal taxonomy and survey of forensic memory acquisition techniques. Digital Investigation, 28, 56-69.
